Who: LEGACY, DEEPSTRYKE, PHOBIA, BLACKRAZOR, Rat Trap, Quickstride
Location: Black Fortress - hallway

> Outside in the hallway, Quickstride had always hated Deepstryke and his crew of lackies and wasn't afraid to take them on all by himself. He snorts angrilly, and gets into beast mode. Rat Trap remains in his beast form, and bristles his own fur.
>
> " If I were you chumps I wouldn't get too cocky!"
>
> Quickstride joins him.
>
> "That's right plane brains! This time, we're not gonna go easy on ya!"
>
> He rears up in front of Deepstryke, flailing his sharp hooves.

"No Don't do that." Legacy said as Quickstride launched foward to get
at Deepstryke.

Meanwhile drew backwards a little drawing the attacking Quickstride
back a few steps. As this happened Deepstryke is easily struck with
one of the many flailing hooves that fly at him from Quickstide,
sending the well armored and hovering Deepstryke, still in his gun
unit mode back a few meters.

Deepstryke just slide back easily enough, his armor only damaged
superficially, a few scuff marks and a few gouged hoof prints in his
metal plating. "An interesting tactic." Deepstryke said as he
reoriented his weapons. "As a light calvery unit you ut yourself off
from your primary artillery unit. Not the most advantageous of plans."

"Computer, engage shield wall." Deepstryke said as primary weapon
glowed and then fired! The beam targeting Quickstride, even as the
tell tale humming noise could be heard of an energy field appearing
between Quickstride and Legacy, perhaps cutting off the Maximals from
the aid of the others!

Even as Deepstryke was doing his manuver Phobia took advantage of the
fact that Rat Trap was focused on Deepstryke and not her. With a blast
of laser fire sent a swath of energy at Rat Trap!

Nightrazor tried to do the same with Legacy, but the large tank turned
his turret mounted ion cannon on the ebony colored ex minion and laid
down some fire power, sending him back a few steps, his chassis
smoking from a few hits. Nightrazor was hurt, but definitely not out
yet!

(TAG)

Preston
